channel.title: Dialogue.. :|

item.title: Dialogue.. :|
item.dc:creator: @I_Uk_0wn4g3_I I Uk 0wn4g3 I
item.description:
@I_Uk_0wn4g3_I wrote:

This is my starter, how would i make it so it doesnt skip them all,

[code]if(starter == 0){
starter = 1;
showInterface(3559);
apset = true;

talk(“Hello, “+playerName+”,”, 2244);

talk(“Welcome to EliteScape…”, 2244);

talk(“Take these as a free gift.”, 2244);
addItem(1321, 1);
addItem(1189, 1);
addItem(556, 5000);
addItem(557, 1000);
addItem(558, 1000);
addItem(555, 1000);
addItem(554, 1000);
addItem(562, 1000);
addItem(841, 1);
addItem(882, 500);
addItem(995, 25000000);

} [/code]

basically when a new player logs in the dialogue goes straight to "take these as a free gift how would i make it so it goes from making a char and so on?

Read full topic
